sentences.sContent: His career has been hindered by injury.
sentences.sCn: 由于受伤，他的事业受到了阻碍。

sentences.sContent: policies that will hinder rather than help families
sentences.sCn: 对家庭有害无益的政策

remMethod.val: 阻碍(hinder)发展， 落在后面(behind)

words.tran: 最后面的，最靠近后方的

trans.tranOther: to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed
